channel.title: CVE Feed for wpdevteam -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for wpdevteam -- all products

item.title: CVE-2021-4446|2024-10-16T15:34:14.629Z -- wpdevteam -- essential%20addons%20for%20elementor%20%E2%80%93%20best%20elementor%20addon%2C%20templates%2C%20widgets%2C%20kits%20%26%20woocommerce%20builders
item.description: The Essential Addons for Elementor plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to authorization bypass in versions up to and including 4.6.4 due to missing capability checks and nonce disclosure. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with minimal permissions such as a subscriber, to perform many unauthorized actions such as changing settings and installing arbitrary plugins.

item.title: CVE-2024-8742|2024-09-13T13:43:03.394Z -- wpdevteam -- essential%20addons%20for%20elementor%20%E2%80%93%20best%20elementor%20addon%2C%20templates%2C%20widgets%2C%20kits%20%26%20woocommerce%20builders
item.description: The Essential Addons for Elementor – Best Elementor Addon, Templates, Widgets, Kits & WooCommerce Builders plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Stored Cross-Site Scripting via the plugin's Filterable Gallery widget in all versions up to, and including, 6.0.3 due to insufficient input sanitization and output escaping on user supplied attributes. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with contributor-level access and above, to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that will execute whenever a user accesses an injected page.

item.title: CVE-2024-8440|2024-09-11T13:16:19.770Z -- wpdevteam -- essential%20addons%20for%20elementor%20%E2%80%93%20best%20elementor%20addon%2C%20templates%2C%20widgets%2C%20kits%20%26%20woocommerce%20builders
item.description: The Essential Addons for Elementor – Best Elementor Templates, Widgets, Kits & WooCommerce Builders plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Stored Cross-Site Scripting via the plugin's Fancy Text widget in all versions up to, and including, 6.0.3 due to insufficient input sanitization and output escaping on user supplied attributes. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with contributor-level access and above, to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that will execute whenever a user accesses an injected page.

item.title: CVE-2024-7092|2024-08-13T13:27:22.551Z -- wpdevteam -- essential%20addons%20for%20elementor%20%E2%80%93%20best%20elementor%20templates%2C%20widgets%2C%20kits%20%26%20woocommerce%20builders
item.description: The Essential Addons for Elementor – Best Elementor Templates, Widgets, Kits & WooCommerce Builders plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Stored Cross-Site Scripting via the ‘no_more_items_text’ parameter in all versions up to, and including, 5.9.27 due to insufficient input sanitization and output escaping. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with Contributor-level access and above, to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that will execute whenever a user accesses an injected page.

item.title: CVE-2024-5571|2024-08-01T21:18:06.783Z -- wpdevteam -- embedpress%20%E2%80%93%20embed%20pdf%2C%20google%20docs%2C%20vimeo%2C%20wistia%2C%20embed%20youtube%20videos%2C%20audios%2C%20maps%20%26%20embed%20any%20documents%20in%20gutenberg%20%26%20elementor
item.description: The EmbedPress – Embed PDF, Google Docs, Vimeo, Wistia, Embed YouTube Videos, Audios, Maps & Embed Any Documents in Gutenberg & Elementor plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Stored Cross-Site Scripting via the 'url' attribute within the plugin's EmbedPress PDF widget in all versions up to, and including, 4.0.1 due to insufficient input sanitization and output escaping on user supplied attributes. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with contributor-level access and above, to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that will execute whenever a user accesses an injected page.

item.title: CVE-2024-6557|2024-08-01T21:41:03.524Z -- wpdevteam -- schedulepress%20%E2%80%93%20auto%20post%20%26%20publish%2C%20auto%20social%20share%2C%20schedule%20posts%20with%20editorial%20calendar%20%26%20missed%20schedule%20post%20publisher
item.description: The SchedulePress – Auto Post & Publish, Auto Social Share, Schedule Posts with Editorial Calendar & Missed Schedule Post Publisher plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Full Path Disclosure in all versions up to, and including, 5.1.3. This is due the plugin utilizing the wpdeveloper library and leaving the demo files in place with display_errors on. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to retrieve the full path of the web application, which can be used to aid other attacks. The information displayed is not useful on its own, and requires another vulnerability to be present for damage to an affected website.

item.title: CVE-2024-5189|2024-08-01T21:03:10.977Z -- wpdevteam -- essential%20addons%20for%20elementor%20%E2%80%93%20best%20elementor%20templates%2C%20widgets%2C%20kits%20%26%20woocommerce%20builders
item.description: The Essential Addons for Elementor – Best Elementor Templates, Widgets, Kits & WooCommerce Builders plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Stored Cross-Site Scripting via the ‘custom_js’ parameter in all versions up to, and including, 5.9.23 due to insufficient input sanitization and output escaping. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with Contributor-level access and above, to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that will execute whenever a user accesses an injected page.

item.title: CVE-2024-5073|2024-08-01T21:03:10.538Z -- wpdevteam -- essential%20addons%20for%20elementor%20%E2%80%93%20best%20elementor%20templates%2C%20widgets%2C%20kits%20%26%20woocommerce%20builders
item.description: The Essential Addons for Elementor – Best Elementor Templates, Widgets, Kits & WooCommerce Builders plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Stored Cross-Site Scripting via the Twitter Feed component in all versions up to, and including, 5.9.21 due to insufficient input sanitization and output escaping. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with Contributor-level access and above, to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that will execute whenever a user accesses an injected page.

item.title: CVE-2024-5188|2024-08-01T21:03:11.069Z -- wpdevteam -- essential%20addons%20for%20elementor%20%E2%80%93%20best%20elementor%20templates%2C%20widgets%2C%20kits%20%26%20woocommerce%20builders
item.description: The Essential Addons for Elementor – Best Elementor Templates, Widgets, Kits & WooCommerce Builders plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Stored Cross-Site Scripting via the 'get_manual_calendar_events' function in all versions up to, and including, 5.9.22 due to insufficient input sanitization and output escaping. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with Contributor-level access and above, to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that will execute whenever a user accesses an injected page.

This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with Contributor-level access and above, to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that will execute whenever a user accesses an injected page.

item.description: The Essential Addons for Elementor – Best Elementor Templates, Widgets, Kits & WooCommerce Builders plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Stored Cross-Site Scripting via the 'get_manual_calendar_events' function in all versions up to, and including, 5.9.22 due to insufficient input sanitization and output escaping. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with Contributor-level access and above, to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that will execute whenever a user accesses an injected page.

item.title: CVE-2024-6557|2024-07-16T14:01:53.973Z -- wpdevteam -- schedulepress%20%E2%80%93%20auto%20post%20%26%20publish%2C%20auto%20social%20share%2C%20schedule%20posts%20with%20editorial%20calendar%20%26%20missed%20schedule%20post%20publisher
item.description: The SchedulePress – Auto Post & Publish, Auto Social Share, Schedule Posts with Editorial Calendar & Missed Schedule Post Publisher plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Full Path Disclosure in all versions up to, and including, 5.1.3. This is due the plugin utilizing the wpdeveloper library and leaving the demo files in place with display_errors on. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to retrieve the full path of the web application, which can be used to aid other attacks. The information displayed is not useful on its own, and requires another vulnerability to be present for damage to an affected website.

item.title: CVE-2024-1565|2024-06-13T08:31:31.631Z -- wpdevteam -- embedpress%20%E2%80%93%20embed%20pdf%2C%20google%20docs%2C%20vimeo%2C%20wistia%2C%20embed%20youtube%20videos%2C%20audios%2C%20maps%20%26%20embed%20any%20documents%20in%20gutenberg%20%26%20elementor
item.description: The EmbedPress – Embed PDF, YouTube, Google Docs, Vimeo, Wistia Videos, Audios, Maps & Any Documents in Gutenberg & Elementor plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Stored Cross-Site Scripting via the PDF Widget URL in all versions up to, and including, 3.9.10 due to insufficient input sanitization and output escaping on user supplied attributes. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers with contributor-level and above permissions to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that will execute whenever a user accesses an injected page.

item.title: CVE-2024-1803|2024-06-04T18:00:50.729Z -- wpdevteam -- embedpress%20%E2%80%93%20embed%20pdf%2C%20google%20docs%2C%20vimeo%2C%20wistia%2C%20embed%20youtube%20videos%2C%20audios%2C%20maps%20%26%20embed%20any%20documents%20in%20gutenberg%20%26%20elementor
item.description: The EmbedPress – Embed PDF, Google Docs, Vimeo, Wistia, Embed YouTube Videos, Audios, Maps & Embed Any Documents in Gutenberg & Elementor plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to unauthorized access of functionality due to insufficient authorization validation on the PDF embed block in all versions up to, and including, 3.9.12. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with contributor-level access and above, to embed PDF blocks.

item.title: CVE-2024-4316|2024-06-04T17:54:34.411Z -- wpdevteam -- embedpress%20%E2%80%93%20embed%20pdf%2C%20google%20docs%2C%20vimeo%2C%20wistia%2C%20embed%20youtube%20videos%2C%20audios%2C%20maps%20%26%20embed%20any%20documents%20in%20gutenberg%20%26%20elementor
item.description: The EmbedPress – Embed PDF, Google Docs, Vimeo, Wistia, Embed YouTube Videos, Audios, Maps & Embed Any Documents in Gutenberg & Elementor plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Stored Cross-Site Scripting via the ‘id’ parameter in all versions up to, and including, 3.9.16 due to insufficient input sanitization and output escaping. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with contributor-level access and above, to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that will execute whenever a user accesses an injected page.

item.title: CVE-2024-4156|2024-06-04T17:54:23.960Z -- wpdevteam -- essential%20addons%20for%20elementor%20%E2%80%93%20best%20elementor%20templates%2C%20widgets%2C%20kits%20%26%20woocommerce%20builders
item.description: The Essential Addons for Elementor – Best Elementor Templates, Widgets, Kits & WooCommerce Builders plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Stored Cross-Site Scripting via the ‘eael_event_text_color’ parameter in versions up to, and including, 5.9.17 due to insufficient input sanitization and output escaping. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with contributor-level permissions and above, to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that will execute whenever a user accesses an injected page.

item.title: CVE-2024-4003|2024-05-02T16:51:51.058Z -- wpdevteam -- essential%20addons%20for%20elementor%20%E2%80%93%20best%20elementor%20templates%2C%20widgets%2C%20kits%20%26%20woocommerce%20builders
item.description: The Essential Addons for Elementor – Best Elementor Templates, Widgets, Kits & WooCommerce Builders plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Stored Cross-Site Scripting via the eael_team_members_image_rounded parameter in the Team Members widget in all versions up to, and including, 5.9.15 due to insufficient input sanitization and output escaping. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with contributor access and higher, to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that will execute whenever a user accesses an injected page.

item.title: CVE-2024-4275|2024-06-04T17:53:31.938Z -- wpdevteam -- essential%20addons%20for%20elementor%20%E2%80%93%20best%20elementor%20templates%2C%20widgets%2C%20kits%20%26%20woocommerce%20builders
item.description: The Essential Addons for Elementor – Best Elementor Templates, Widgets, Kits & WooCommerce Builders plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Stored Cross-Site Scripting via the plugin's Interactive Circle widget in all versions up to, and including, 5.9.19 due to insufficient input sanitization and output escaping on user supplied attributes. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with contributor-level access and above, to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that will execute whenever a user accesses an injected page.

item.title: CVE-2024-4449|2024-05-10T07:33:37.890Z -- wpdevteam -- essential%20addons%20for%20elementor%20%E2%80%93%20best%20elementor%20templates%2C%20widgets%2C%20kits%20%26%20woocommerce%20builders
item.description: The Essential Addons for Elementor – Best Elementor Templates, Widgets, Kits & WooCommerce Builders plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Stored Cross-Site Scripting via the plugin's 'Fancy Text', 'Filter Gallery', 'Sticky Video', 'Content Ticker', 'Woo Product Gallery', & 'Twitter Feed' widgets in all versions up to, and including, 5.9.19 due to insufficient input sanitization and output escaping on user supplied attributes. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with contributor-level access and above, to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that will execute whenever a user accesses an injected page.

item.title: CVE-2024-4448|2024-06-04T17:53:26.017Z -- wpdevteam -- essential%20addons%20for%20elementor%20%E2%80%93%20best%20elementor%20templates%2C%20widgets%2C%20kits%20%26%20woocommerce%20builders
item.description: The Essential Addons for Elementor – Best Elementor Templates, Widgets, Kits & WooCommerce Builders plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Stored Cross-Site Scripting via the plugin's 'Dual Color Header', 'Event Calendar', & 'Advanced Data Table' widgets in all versions up to, and including, 5.9.19 due to insufficient input sanitization and output escaping on user supplied attributes. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with contributor-level access and above, to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that will execute whenever a user accesses an injected page.

item.title: CVE-2024-4624|2024-06-04T17:53:24.587Z -- wpdevteam -- essential%20addons%20for%20elementor%20%E2%80%93%20best%20elementor%20templates%2C%20widgets%2C%20kits%20%26%20woocommerce%20builders
item.description: The Essential Addons for Elementor – Best Elementor Templates, Widgets, Kits & WooCommerce Builders plugins for WordPress is vulnerable to Stored Cross-Site Scripting via the ‘eael_ext_toc_title_tag’ parameter in versions up to, and including, 5.9.20 due to insufficient input sanitization and output escaping. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with contributor-level permissions and above, to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that will execute whenever a user accesses an injected page.

item.title: CVE-2024-4891|2024-06-04T17:52:58.930Z -- wpdevteam -- essential%20blocks%20%E2%80%93%20page%20builder%20gutenberg%20blocks%2C%20patterns%20%26%20templates
item.description: The Essential Blocks – Page Builder Gutenberg Blocks, Patterns & Templates plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Stored Cross-Site Scripting via the ‘tagName’ parameter in versions up to, and including, 4.5.12 due to insufficient input sanitization and output escaping. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with contributor-level permissions and above, to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that will execute whenever a user accesses an injected page.

item.title: CVE-2024-3733|2024-04-25T08:29:00.282Z -- wpdevteam -- essential%20addons%20for%20elementor%20%E2%80%93%20best%20elementor%20templates%2C%20widgets%2C%20kits%20%26%20woocommerce%20builders
item.description: The Essential Addons for Elementor – Best Elementor Templates, Widgets, Kits & WooCommerce Builders plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Sensitive Information Exposure in all versions up to, and including, 5.9.15 via the ajax_load_more() , eael_woo_pagination_product_ajax(), and ajax_eael_product_gallery() functions. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to extract posts that may be in private or draft status.

item.title: CVE-2024-3728|2024-06-04T17:31:04.149Z -- wpdevteam -- essential%20addons%20for%20elementor%20%E2%80%93%20best%20elementor%20templates%2C%20widgets%2C%20kits%20%26%20woocommerce%20builders
item.description: The Essential Addons for Elementor – Best Elementor Templates, Widgets, Kits & WooCommerce Builders plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Stored Cross-Site Scripting via the plugin's Filterable Gallery & Interactive Circle widgets in all versions up to, and including, 5.9.15 due to insufficient input sanitization and output escaping on user supplied attributes. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with contributor-level access and above, to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that will execute whenever a user accesses an injected page.

item.description: The EmbedPress – Embed PDF, YouTube, Google Docs, Vimeo, Wistia Videos, Audios, Maps & Any Documents in Gutenberg & Elementor plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Stored Cross-Site Scripting via the PDF Widget URL in all versions up to, and including, 3.9.10 due to insufficient input sanitization and output escaping on user supplied attributes. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers with contributor-level and above permissions to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that will execute whenever a user accesses an injected page.

item.title: CVE-2024-3733|2024-08-01T20:20:01.126Z -- wpdevteam -- essential%20addons%20for%20elementor%20%E2%80%93%20best%20elementor%20templates%2C%20widgets%2C%20kits%20%26%20woocommerce%20builders
item.description: The Essential Addons for Elementor – Best Elementor Templates, Widgets, Kits & WooCommerce Builders plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Sensitive Information Exposure in all versions up to, and including, 5.9.15 via the ajax_load_more() , eael_woo_pagination_product_ajax(), and ajax_eael_product_gallery() functions. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to extract posts that may be in private or draft status.

item.description: The Essential Addons for Elementor – Best Elementor Addon, Templates, Widgets, Kits & WooCommerce Builders plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Stored Cross-Site Scripting via the plugin's Filterable Gallery widget in all versions up to, and including, 6.0.3 due to insufficient input sanitization and output escaping on user supplied attributes. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with contributor-level access and above, to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that will execute whenever a user accesses an injected page.

item.title: CVE-2021-4446|2024-10-16T06:43:25.787Z -- wpdevteam -- essential%20addons%20for%20elementor%20%E2%80%93%20best%20elementor%20addon%2C%20templates%2C%20widgets%2C%20kits%20%26%20woocommerce%20builders
item.description: The Essential Addons for Elementor plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to authorization bypass in versions up to and including 4.6.4 due to missing capability checks and nonce disclosure. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with minimal permissions such as a subscriber, to perform many unauthorized actions such as changing settings and installing arbitrary plugins.

item.title: CVE-2021-4447|2024-10-16T06:43:42.210Z -- wpdevteam -- essential%20addons%20for%20elementor%20%E2%80%93%20best%20elementor%20addon%2C%20templates%2C%20widgets%2C%20kits%20%26%20woocommerce%20builders
item.description: The Essential Addons for Elementor plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to privilege escalation in versions up to and including 4.6.4 due to a lack of restrictions on who can add a registration form and a custom registration role to an Elementor created page. This makes it possible for attackers with access to the Elementor page builder to create a new registration form that defaults to the user role being set to administrator and subsequently register as an administrative user.
